EmailTemplate.description: Following submission of Completed Onboarding Pack
EmailTemplate.name: Onboarding Follow Up v1
EmailTemplate.subject: Foundation Pre-Launch Follow Up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName}!
We’re XX away from the {!Onboarding__c.Planned_Launch_Date__c} launch of your new Digital Ads. I’m following up on the additional items and guidance we'll need from you before launch.
Please Email Us: Your Dealer Logo (high res vector or .png file) Zips To Target (or exclude) Approved Monthly Budget Maximums
Please Accept Our Request To Access: Google My Business Access: Request sent today, Facebook Access: Request sent today,
Please Grant readonly@foundationdirect.com Access To: Your Existing Google Ads Account (used to set performance benchmarks) Your Existing Google Analytics Account (used to import conversion goals into Google Ads for measurement & optimization)
Please Advise on: Which Google Analytics View contains the Goals you'd like us to import as conversions
Please don't hesitate to call, email or text with any questions!
Thanks again! Jackie Puliam Jackie@foundationdirect.com 571-370-3032
